_comment_HOST_APP: Use 'localhost' if running outside Docker, 'host.docker.internal' if inside Docker
_comment_HOST_SEARXNG: Use 'localhost' if running outside Docker, 'searxng' if inside Docker

openai_compatible._comment_baseurls_for_various_llm_provid: These URLs are used to route requests based on the llm_type specified. if using any local servers using dockers use host.docker.internal else localhost
